text: The Marqueyssac gardens are located in the town of VÃ©zac, in the French department of Dordogne, in the Nouvelle-Aquitaine region. They are on the list of remarkable gardens in France. Nineteen hectares form a site classified for its "picturesque and historical interest" since the ministerial decree of December 16, 1969. Laid out on a rocky outcrop 130 meters above the river, the park offers a view of the valley, castles and neighboring villages, including Beynac-et-Cazenac, Fayrac, Castelnaud, La Roque-Gageac and Domme.https://marqueyssac.com/ ==References== Category:Dordogne Category:Gardens
title: Jardins de Marqueyssac
